Remove File

  • rmFile(id:list, pathdir:Path) -> None:

    Purpose:function to remove a single file(i.e .txt, .py, etc).

{% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

{% endraw %}

Remove File w/ Specific Extension

  • rmFileExt(pathdir:Path, extension:str ) -> None":

    Purpose:function to remove any files with a specific extension(i.e. ".txt").

{% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

{% endraw %}

Remove Directory

  • rmDir(pathdir:Path, dir:str) -> None:

    Purpose:use this function to remove unwanted directory such as Colab autosave generated folder, ".ipynb_checkpoint".

{% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

rmDir[source]

rmDir(path_dir:Path, dir:str)

{% endraw %}

Display Directory Information

  • showDirInf(path_dir:Path, suffixlist:list) -> None:

    Purpose:list files of a directory given the path. > In the "_suffixlist:list" parameter, list the different types of image extensions that you want to display. For example: ['.jpg', '.jpeg', '.png']. If the code detects other formats, it will notify with a message. By default, it includes "jpg" and "png".

{% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

showDirInf[source]

showDirInf(path_dir:Path, suffix_list:list=['.jpg', '.jpeg', '.png'])

Show file paths, names, types and indicate wheather to remove. Args path_dir : path to image directory suffix_list : list of acceptable image suffixes or extensions(remove if not listed) Return None

{% endraw %}
